component_text.text: dy_gift name dy_gift name dy_gift name

dy_souls.componentleveltooltip: Number of Souls required to activate this Gift. Souls spent in this way will contribute towards unlocking new Gifts.

This number of Souls will be removed from your total each turn. If you cannot afford this upkeep, active Gifts will be deactivated. Souls spent in this way will contribute towards unlocking new Gifts.
This will be deducted from your total Souls each turn. If you cannot afford this cost, active Gifts will be deactivated. Souls spent in this way will contributing towards unlock new Gifts.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Do(DoIf(PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key == "rhox_nor_firebrand_slavers" || (PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key != "cr_nor_avags" && PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key != "wh3_dlc20_chs_festus" && PlayersFaction.FactionRecordContext.Key != "wh3_dlc20_chs_azazel"), self.SetVisible(true)), self.SetAnimationFrameProperty("show", 0, "interpolation_time", ToVector(RandomInRange(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("idle_min")), ToNumber(self.GetProperty("idle_max"))), 0, 0, 0)), self.SetAnimationFrameProperty("show", 1, "interpolation_time", ToVector(RandomInRange(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("breath_min")), ToNumber(self.GetProperty("breath_max"))), 0, 0, 0)))
Do(self.TriggerAnimation("stop"), self.SetState("squashed")) # i don't think this is what my dev manager was expecting when i said i was squashing bugs
